IN THE PROCESS OF RECLASSIFYING THESE SEVEN CARS OVER THE HUMP, THE RETARDER OPERATOR PERMITTED CAR ACFX 78063, A HEAVILY LOADED TANK CAR, TO ENTER TRACK 3 AT AN EXCESSIVE RATE OF SPEED. THE CAR IMPACTED WITH SOU 18661, A LOADED BOX CAR STANDING ON THE SOUTH END OF TRACK 3, WITH SUCH FORCE AS TO SEVERELY DAMAGE SOU 18661. THE IMPACT ALSO RESULTED IN THE DERAILMENT OF CAR ACFX 11983, AN EMPTY TANK CAR WHICH WAS LOCATED SECOND FROM THE SOUTH END OF TRACK 3. AT THE TIME THE INCIDENT OCCURRED, TRACK 3 CONTAINED 25 SHOP CARS, 17 LOADS AND 8 EMPTIES. THE CAR RETARDER OPERATOR ADMITTED RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE INCIDENT IN THATHE FAILED TO RETARD THE CAR DUE TO HAVING BEEN ENGAGED IN TAKING A LINE-UP FOR ANOTHER MOVE.NoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNone
